full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Contract for Ship Repair Work

**Contract Title (English/French):**
F6855-241065 CCGS Cape Roger Docking (Mise en cale sèche du NGCC Cape Roger)

**Reference Number:**
WS4476438501-Doc4510709587

**Amendment Number:**
2

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)

**Notice Type:**
Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Procurement Category:**
Government of Canada (GD) - Shuttle worth every pound slashed off prices

**Procurement Method:**
Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Trade Agreements:**
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)/Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

**Document Intent:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is issuing a bid solicitation for the acquisition of ship repair work on the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Cape Roger.

**Document Description:**

- **Description:**
Ship repair work for the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Cape Roger.
- **UNSpsc Code:** 25111500 (Commercial marine craft)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
- **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
- **Contracting Dates:**
- Expected start date: May 10, 2024
- Tender closing date: May 7, 2024
- The Request for Proposal (RFP) will be made available on Ariba’s website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19237020?extsite=MTkyMzcwMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Rating Details:**
Tender is to be ranked according to price. The lowest priced supplier will be awarded the contract.

**Expected Start Date:**
May 10, 2024 [achieved]

You must submit your paper or portal application on, or before the announced tender closing date and time to be considered. Late submissions will not be accepted.


### Note - Terms and Conditions for this contract
